title.rendered: How is NMIMS Distance MBA for Information Technology?

content.rendered:
Information Technology forms the core of any contemporary system. With the global economy going digital, the jobs in the IT sector have grown exponentially. Stats suggest that between 2009 and 2022, the employment in the IT industry has increased from 1.96 million to 4.85 million. Additionally, the amalgamation of IT and management education is highly lucrative. Even a little hardware malfunction or software delay can have an effect on a company’s bottom line in this technologically dependent economy. Companies in practically every sector depend on experienced IT managers to keep operations running, address issues as they arise, deal with crises, and anticipate future technological requirements. 

Importance of IT Management

IT management is a key component of many business plans nowadays. Better and more dependable internal organisation can be achieved by the means of IT management as it is the focal point of hardware, software, and networks. Such a program is meant to accelerate a company’s growth through technology. Many enterprises work on the basis of IT, from automation to communication, technology is all there is. Moreover, new advancement in technologies such as Blockchain, Crypto, Artificial Intelligence, Chatbots and much more are also headed towards transforming the IT sector, thus creating more jobs and demand in the global market.

Therefore, pursuing a management degree in IT is a good choice in today’s tech-oriented industry as this specialisation not only caters to technological advancement and its execution but it also comes with managerial responsibilities such as effective risk management, integrating technology with business plan for strategic growth and  much more.  All these skills are important to ensure a smooth operational process.

NMIMS Distance MBA in IT and System Management 

Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies is among India’s top 10 Business Schools. Established in the year 1984, it gained Deemed-to-be-University status. Additionally, the UGC has awarded the university with Category-1 autonomy status for its academic excellence and holistic growth opportunities offered to the students. 

The university is also accredited by AICTE and DEB. The prestigious accreditation body  NAAC has also endorsed it with “A+” grade. With all these accolades in its pocket, NMIMS offers courses that are accepted worldwide. They are industry oriented with a special focus on skill development. The university provides “Career Development Services” and access to “Free Alumni Portal” in their distance courses to help students with job placements, enhancement of soft skills and interview preparation. Therefore, it not only brings flexibility in learning but also provides students with a platform to grow. 

The university offers ten specialisations in their distance MBA course, namely:

  1. Information Technology and System Management
  2. Marketing Management 
  3. Business Management 
  4. HR Management 
  5. Financial Management 
  6. International Trade Management 
  7. Banking and Finance Management 
  8. Supply Chain Management
  9. Operations Management
  10.  Retail Management

According to stats, more than 603 out of all the students who get enrolled into NMIMS’ distance MBA courses opt for Information Technology and System Management. This implies that it is among the highest chosen specialisations for management studies. 

NMIMS has thoughtfully crafted their curriculum for working professionals so that they can get promoted to higher managerial positions or switch jobs. MBA IT and Systems Management curriculum is perfectly aligned with the latest industry standards. Due to the autonomy status, the university can tweak and add relevant case studies and other practical resources to help students bridge the gap between their education and corporate job. 

Program Structure :

Eligibility  for the Course: 

  • Bachelors’ Degree (10+2+3) in any discipline from any recognised University or an equivalent degree recognised by Association of Indian Universities (AIU) with a minimum of 50% marks at Graduation Level

Fee Structure:

One Time payment – For Complete 2 years – INR 1,44,000/-

Annual Payment – INR 79,000/- Per Year

Semester payment – INR 42,000/- Per Semester 

Highlights of the Program: 

  1. Research Project 
  2. Viva 

Classes, Exams and Assignments 

The university offers two types of programs- Pro and Prime. In type one, the students get access to live classes with recorded videos and in the other type, the students get only recorded classes. Taking into consideration the needs of working professionals, the university has scheduled evening classes, from 7:00 p.m. to 9:30 p.m. from Monday to Friday and morning lectures on Saturday. Although, there is no attendance criteria for the students to give them flexibility of time and leverage the mode of education. 

The exams are conducted online for the duration of the pandemic but there are various regional centers across the country where the students can visit and give their exams. 

Career Prospects of Information Technology and System Management 

The career opportunities are diverse in this field which opens the door of career opportunities wide open. Every aspect of the organisation is run by technology. Therefore, there is a lot of tech-dependability which requires highly professional and skilled individuals.
